REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C T f1362 reute b f BC-/NY-TRADERS-SAY-TURKE 03-25 0085

TEXT.TITLE: NY TRADERS SAY TURKEY MADE LARGE SUGAR PURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: Turkey bought an estimated 100,000 tonnes of white sugar from three trade houses today for April to June shipment, according to trade sources. They said a large U.K. trade house sold 50,000 tonnes, a U.S. house traded 25,000 tonnes, and a Swiss-based dealer house 25,000 tonnes. Price details were unclear but reports this morning suggested that Turkey was offered sugar at prices ranging down to 212 dlrs a tonne, c and f basis. Reuter
